T04D3897:109a-1: sam skri ta aa sam skri ta bi ni shtsa ya n'a ma /
T04D3897:109a-3: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba /
T04D3897:109a-5: chos rnams spros dang bcas pa ni //
T04D3897:109a-6: dpal ldan rang nyid kun mkhyen nas //
T04D3897:109a-7: de ltar sems can la gsung gang //
T04D3897:109a-8: thams cad rig pa de la 'dud //
T04D3897:109a-10: mdor bsdus nas ni thub pas gsungs //
T04D3897:109a-11: de dag rnam par nges pa ni //
T04D3897:109a-12: bdag nyid 'ba' zhig dran phyir bshad //
T04D3897:109a-13: chos mdor bsdus na rnam pa gnyis nyid de /
T04D3897:109a-16: de la 'dus byas ni mi rtag pa nyid do //
T04D3897:109a-17: 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa nyid do //
T04D3897:109a-18: yang 'dus byas ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-19: 'dus ma byas ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-20: yang 'dus byas ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o //
T04D3897:109a-21: 'dus ma byas ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma yin pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-22: yang 'dus byas ni bla na yod pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-23: 'dus ma byas ni bla na med pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-24: yang 'dus byas ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-25: 'dus ma byas ni 'jig rten las 'das pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-26: yang 'dus byas ni gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-27: 'dus ma byas ni gzugs can ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-28: yang 'dus byas ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-29: 'dus ma byas ni zag pa med pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-30: yang 'dus byas ni nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-31: 'dus ma byas ni nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-32: yang 'dus byas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byad pa pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-33: 'dus ma byas ni rnam par byad pa pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-34: yang 'dus byas ni spang bya dang blang bya'o //
T04D3897:109a-35: 'dus ma byas ni blang bya kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-36: yang 'dus byas ni brten par bya ba dang brten par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-37: 'dus ma byas ni brten par bya ba ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-38: yang 'dus byas ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-39: 'dus ma byas ni dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109a-40: de la dge ba ni gcig ste /
T04D3897:109a-41: 'di ltar so sor brtag pa'i 'gog pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-42: lung du ma bstan pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T04D3897:109a-43: 'di ltar nam mkha' dang so sor brtag pa ma yin pa'o //
T04D3897:109a-44: yang 'dus byas ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam grangs
T04D3897:109b-0: @109b su gtogs pa dang gzugs kyi khams kyi rnam
T04D3897:109b-1: grangs su gtogs pa dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
T04D3897:109b-3: 'dus ma byas ni zag pa med pa'i khams kyi rnam grangs su gtogs pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-4: yang 'dus byas ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang
T04D3897:109b-5: kun 'byung gi bden pa dang lam gyi bden pa'o
T04D3897:109b-6: // 'dus ma byas ni 'gog pa'i bden pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-7: yang 'dus byas ni sdug bsngal gyis thob pa dang
T04D3897:109b-8: kun 'byung gis thob pa dang 'gog pas thob pa
T04D3897:109b-9: dang lam gyis thob pa dang bsgom pas spang bar
T04D3897:109b-10: bya'o // 'dus ma byas ni spang bya ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-12: gzugs kyi phung pos kun tu bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-13: tshor ba'i phung pos kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-14: 'du shes kyi phung pos kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-15: 'du byed kyi phung pos kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-16: rnam par shes pa'i phung pos kun du bsdus pa'o //
T04D3897:109b-17: 'dus ma byas ni phung pos bsdus pa ma yin pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-19: mig gi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-20: rna ba'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-21: sna'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-22: lce'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-23: lus kyi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-24: yid kyi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-25: gzugs kyi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-26: sgra'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-27: dri'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-28: ro'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-29: reg pa'i skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-30: chos kyi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa'o //
T04D3897:109b-31: 'dus ma byas ni chos kyi skye mched kyis kun du bsdus pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-33: mig gi khams kyis kun du bsdus pa nas /
T04D3897:109b-34: yid kyi khams kyi bar du kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-35: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis bsdus pa nas /
T04D3897:109b-36: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du kun du bsdus pa dang /
T04D3897:109b-37: gzugs kyi khams kyis bsdus pa nas /
T04D3897:109b-38: chos kyi khams kyi bar gyis bsdus pa'o //
T04D3897:109b-39: 'dus ma byas ni chos kyi khams kyis kun du bsdus pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:109b-40: de la gzhung du 'chad par 'gyur ba gang 'gog
T04D3897:109b-41: pa'i bden pas kun du bsdus pa'i chos rnams dang
T04D3897:109b-42: nam mkha' ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so //
T04D3897:110a-3: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
T04D3897:110a-5: 'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma //
T04D3897:110a-6: bdag gis stong zhing byed po med //
T04D3897:110a-7: pandi ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis
T04D3897:110a-8: bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par
T04D3897:110a-9: nges pa las 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam
T04D3897:110a-10: par dbye ba nges pa zhes bya ba le'u dang
T04D3897:110a-12: / de la 'di gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid 'dus byas te /
T04D3897:110a-16: 'di rnams su rgas pa bsdus pas bzhi ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ces kha cig go //
T04D3897:110a-17: 'dus byas ni 'di bskyed par bya ba'i phyir rgyu ni drug ste /
T04D3897:110a-20: skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu dang /
T04D3897:110a-21: mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dang /
T04D3897:110a-22: thams cad du 'gro ba'i rgyu dang /
T04D3897:110a-24: rgyu de rnams kyis khyad par ma yin pa'i 'bras bu ni gcig ste /
T04D3897:110a-27: khyad par ni 'bras bu bzhi ste /
T04D3897:110a-29: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'i 'o //
T04D3897:110a-30: byed pa'i rgyu'i ni bdag po'i 'bras bu'o //
T04D3897:110a-31: skal ba ma nyam pa dang thams cad du 'gro ba'i rgyu dag gi ni rgyu mthun gyi 'bras bu'o//
T04D3897:110a-32: lhan cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu dag gi ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T04D3897:110a-36: de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang /
T04D3897:110a-39: de la chos 'dus byas kyi bdag nyid rang gi
T04D3897:110a-40: ngo bo las gzhan chos thams cad ni byed pa'i
T04D3897:110a-41: rgyu ste / skye ba rnams la gegs med pa'i ngo bos rnam par gnas pas so //
T04D3897:110a-42: gang chos phan tshun 'bras bur gyur pa de ni phan tshun lhan cig tu 'byung ba'i rgyu ste /
T04D3897:110a-45: sngon goms par byas pa 'dra ba'i chos phyi ma
T04D3897:110a-46: 'dra ba rgyas pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid yin par skal
T04D3897:110a-49: dge ba'i phung po lnga las dge ba dang /
T04D3897:110a-50: nyon mongs pa can las nyon mongs pa can dang /
T04D3897:110a-51: lung du ma bstan pa las lung du ma bstan pa'o //
T04D3897:110a-52: gang chos ngo bo lhan cig tu dmigs pa kun du grub pa ste /
T04D3897:110b-0: yang gang rung ma tshangs @110b bas ni ma yin pa de ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu ste /
T04D3897:110b-2: sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T04D3897:110b-3: rang gis la sngon nye bar skyes pa nyid kun
T04D3897:110b-4: du 'gro ba'i chos rnams ni nyon mongs pa can
T04D3897:110b-5: phyi ma rnams kyi kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu ste
T04D3897:110b-6: / nyon mongs pa can gyi chos spyi'i rgyu nyid
T04D3897:110b-7: yin pas 'di ni skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu las
T04D3897:110b-8: tha dad du rnam par gzhag go //
T04D3897:110b-9: 'dod chags la sogs pa gang 'ga' zhig gi nyon
T04D3897:110b-10: mongs pa goms pas zhe sdang la sogs pa thams
T04D3897:110b-11: cad kyi rgyun rgyas par byed pa'o //
T04D3897:110b-12: bdag nyid dngos po yongs su bzung ba'i phyir mi
T04D3897:110b-13: dge ba dang dge ba zag bcas kyi chos gang
T04D3897:110b-14: de ni rnam par smin pa'i rgyu'o //
T04D3897:110b-15: lung du ma bstan pa yang ma yin te /
T04D3897:110b-16: sa bon rul ba bzhin du stobs zhan pa'o //
T04D3897:110b-17: zag pa med pa yang ma yin te /
T04D3897:110b-18: sred pas mngon par brlan pa nyid yin pas mngon
T04D3897:110b-19: par brlan pa med pa'i snying po sa bon bzhin
T04D3897:110b-20: du bdag gi ngo bo mngon par 'grub pa'i nus
T04D3897:110b-21: pa med pa'o // de la lung du ma bstan
T04D3897:110b-22: pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i dge ba dang
T04D3897:110b-23: mi dge bas mngon par grub pa sems can du
T04D3897:110b-24: bstan pa'i chos ni rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'o
T04D3897:110b-25: pa med pa'o // // sngon skyes pa las gzhan
T04D3897:110b-26: 'dus byas pa'i chos ni 'dus byas thams cad kyi
T04D3897:110b-28: chos gang rang gi rgyu dang 'dra ba de ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T04D3897:110b-29: stobs gang gis gang nye bar skye ba de ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ste /
T04D3897:110b-30: 'di ltar sa 'og ma'i sbyor ba'i sems ni sa gong ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T04D3897:110b-31: zag pa dang bcas pas zag pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T04D3897:110b-32: de la byed pa'i rgyu ma gtogs pa rgyu lnga ni rgyu'i rkyen no //
T04D3897:110b-33: dgra bcom pa'i tha ma'i sems dang sems las byung ba spangs te /
T04D3897:110b-34: sems dang sems las byung ba nye bar skye ba thams cad ni de ma thag pa'i rkyen no //
T04D3897:110b-35: mig gi rnam shes la sogs pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T04D3897:110b-36: yid kyi rnam shes kyi chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ni dmigs pa'i rkyen no //
T04D3897:110b-37: gang byed pa'i rgyu de ni bdag po'i rkyen no //
T04D3897:110b-38: de la 'gog pa la mngon par phyogs te lhan
T04D3897:110b-39: cig 'byung ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu gnyis
T04D3897:110b-41: lhan cig nye bar skye ba'i 'bras bu la de gnyis rtsom pa byed pas so //
T04D3897:111a-0: skal ba mnyam pa thams cad du 'gro ba rnam @111a * //
T04D3897:111a-1: par smin pa'i rgyu rnams ni skye ba la mngon par phyogs te ma 'ongs pa la byed do //
T04D3897:111a-2: de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni skye bzhin pa la bya ba byed de go skabs ster bas so //
T04D3897:111a-3: dmigs pa'i rkyen ni 'gag bzhin pa la bya ba byed do //
T04D3897:111a-4: da ltar ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba 'dzin pas so ;
T04D3897:111a-5: / bdag po'i rkyen ni'ang gnas skabs thams cad du
T04D3897:111a-6: sgrib pa med pa'i ngo bos rnam par gnas pa'o
T04D3897:111a-7: // pandi ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen
T04D3897:111a-8: gyis bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam
T04D3897:111a-9: par nges pa las rgyu rnam par nges pa zhes
T04D3897:111a-12: // / chos 'dus byas ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T04D3897:111a-16: de la snod kyi 'jig rten rnam pa mang du gyur pa yin yang /
T04D3897:111a-18: nam mkha'i mthar thug pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro //
T04D3897:111a-19: de'i steng na chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T04D3897:111a-20: de'i steng na dbang chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T04D3897:111a-22: de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi //
T04D3897:111a-23: gnas dbyibs bshad de 'og dag na //
T04D3897:111a-24: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni //
T04D3897:111a-25: 'bum phrag drug cu grangs med do //
T04D3897:111a-26: chu rngam 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang //
T04D3897:111a-27: stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o //
T04D3897:111a-28: phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //
T04D3897:111a-29: lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur //
T04D3897:111a-31: / de la lhag ma zhes bya ba ni dbang
T04D3897:111a-32: chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor rngams su dpag tshad stong
T04D3897:111a-33: phrag nyi shus lhag pa'i 'bum phrag gsum gyi tshad
T04D3897:111a-34: do // rgyar yangs pa'i tshad kyang /
T04D3897:111a-35: chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor la //
T04D3897:111a-36: thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang //
T04D3897:111a-37: stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni //
T04D3897:111a-38: phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o //
T04D3897:111a-39: khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:111a-41: dbang chen gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng dbus ni ri rab rin po che bzhi'i rang bzhin no //
T04D3897:111a-42: de la rin po che bzhi ni /
T04D3897:111a-48: ri bo rgyud bdun ni gser ro //
T04D3897:111a-57: de las phyi rol khor yug ri ni lcags so dgu pa'o //
T04D3897:111a-58: gser gyi sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na chu'i
T04D3897:111b-0: dkyil 'khor rngams su @111b dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad
T04D3897:111b-1: cu dang ri rab la sogs pa ri dgu po
T04D3897:111b-2: rnams bying ba'o // de skad du yang /
T04D3897:111b-3: lhun po rin chen bzhi rang bzhin //
T04D3897:111b-4: chu ru stong phrag brgyad cu nub //
T04D3897:111b-5: chu las steng du ri bo yang //
T04D3897:111b-6: stong phrag dag ni brgyad cu'o //
T04D3897:111b-7: brgyad po 'phang du phyed phyed dbri //
T04D3897:111b-8: de dag rngams su 'phang dang mnyam //
T04D3897:111b-10: ri bo mchog la sogs pa nas mu khyud 'dzin
T04D3897:111b-11: gyi mthar thug par ri rnams kyi bar dang bar
T04D3897:111b-12: du bsil ba zhes pa rgya mtsho bdun te /
T04D3897:111b-13: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'o //
T04D3897:111b-14: de la chu'i yan lag brgyad ni 'di lta ste /
T04D3897:111b-20: dri ngan pa med pa dang /
T04D3897:111b-21: 'thung ba na mgrin pa mi 'gag pa dang /
T04D3897:111b-22: 'thungs na yang lto ba la mi gnod pa'o //
T04D3897:111b-24: de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin //
T04D3897:111b-25: dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T04D3897:111b-26: de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin //
T04D3897:111b-27: de yi ngos la sum 'gyur te //
T04D3897:111b-28: rol mtsho gzhan rnams phyed phyed do //
T04D3897:111b-30: mu khyud 'dzin dang khor yug dag gi bar du ni ba tshva can gyi rgya mtsho chen po'o //
T04D3897:111b-32: lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen la //
T04D3897:111b-33: 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni //
T04D3897:111b-34: nyi shu gnyis so de la ni //
T04D3897:111b-36: mu khyud 'dzin gyi phyi rol phyogs bzhir gling bzhi'o //
T04D3897:111b-39: nub tu ba lang spyod dang /
T04D3897:111b-40: byang du sgra mi snyan dang /
T04D3897:111b-44: 'dzam bu'i gling ni ngos gsum la //
T04D3897:111b-45: stong phrag gnyis te shing rta'i dbyibs //
T04D3897:111b-46: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi //
T04D3897:111b-49: dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:111b-50: ba lang spyod ni zlum po la //
T04D3897:111b-51: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
T04D3897:111b-52: dbus la stong phrag phyed dang gsum //
T04D3897:111b-53: sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam //
T04D3897:111b-55: bar bar du gling brgyad de /
T04D3897:111b-57: 'dzam bu'i gling gi logs gnyis su rnga yab dang /
T04D3897:112a-2: 'dir 'dzam bu'i gling la 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang du ri nag po gsum ste /
T04D3897:112a-3: de las 'das pa na yang gsum mo //
T04D3897:112a-5: de'i pha rol na ri kha ba can nyid do //
T04D3897:112a-6: de'i pha rol na chu dang zheng du dpag tshad
T04D3897:112a-7: lnga bcu yod pa mtsho ma dros pa zhes bya
T04D3897:112a-8: ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'o
T04D3897:112a-9: // de las chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab pa nyid do //
T04D3897:112a-15: mtsho 'di'i 'gram byang phyogs na 'dzam bu'i shing yod de /
T04D3897:112a-16: mtho ba dang rgyar dpag tshad lnga bcu'i tshad dang ldan pa'o //
T04D3897:112a-17: gzhi gang zhig gis 'dzam gling zhes grags pa //
T04D3897:112a-18: gang gi 'bras bu mngar dang ro mchog go //
T04D3897:112a-19: de'i pha rol na ri spos kyi ngad ldang ba'o //
T04D3897:112a-21: rdo rje'i gdan gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi las mngon par grub pa /
T04D3897:112a-22: mtho ru 'dzam bu'i gling gi mtha' dang /
T04D3897:112a-23: zheng du shing rta 'khor lo'i tshad dang ldan pa /
T04D3897:112a-24: gang du srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa'
T04D3897:112a-25: bzhugs nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin skyed
T04D3897:112a-26: par byed pa gang yin pa'o //
T04D3897:112a-27: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi 'og / dpag tshad
T04D3897:112a-28: stong phrag nyi shu na mnar med pa'i dmyal ba
T04D3897:112a-29: chen po yod de rngams dang zheng dag tu dpag
T04D3897:112a-30: tshad stong phrag nyi shu'i tshad dang ldan pa'o //
T04D3897:112a-31: de ltar 'di nas mnar med pa 'di'i 'og gi
T04D3897:112a-32: sa gzhi ni dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcur 'gyur
T04D3897:112a-34: gong nas gong du dmyal ba bdun rnam par gnas so //
T04D3897:112a-42: yang sos so zhes mnar med pa'i phyogs bzhi ru
T04D3897:112a-43: phyi rol 'khor nas gnas so zhes gzhan dag go
T04D3897:112a-44: // mnar med la sogs pa de rnams ni dmyal ba chen po brgyad do //
T04D3897:112a-45: dmyal ba chen po brgyad po rnams so so la nye 'khor gyi dmyal ba bcu drug ste /
T04D3897:112a-49: spu gris gtams pa'i lam la sogs pa dang /
T04D3897:112a-51: phyogs gcig la'ang nye ba'i dmyal ba bzhi ste /
T04D3897:112a-52: 'di ltar phyogs gzhan gsum la so sor bzhi kho na nyid de bcu drug go //
T04D3897:112b-0: gzhan yang grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad ni dmyal @112b
T04D3897:112b-1: ba chen po rnams kyi thad du gnas pa nyid
T04D3897:112b-11: nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams ni gnas nges pa med de /
T04D3897:112b-13: rgya mtsho'i 'gram dang ri dang mya ngam thang dang yul ngan la sogs pa rnams su gnas pa'o //
T04D3897:112b-14: dud 'gro rnams kyi rtsa ba'i gnas ni rgya mtsho che /
T04D3897:112b-15: skam dang chu dang nam mkha' la'ang /
T04D3897:112b-17: yi dvags rnams kyi rgyal po gshin rje'o //
T04D3897:112b-18: de yang 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i 'og gi cha la /
T04D3897:112b-19: dpag tshad lnga brgyas mtshams yongs su bcad pa ni rgyal po'i gnas sa'o //
T04D3897:112b-20: de las gzhan du rnam par brten pa nyid do //
T04D3897:112b-21: lha ma yin ni ri rab la ste /
T04D3897:112b-22: bang rim 'og ma las 'og gi nang chen po'i phug na kun du gnas so //
T04D3897:112b-23: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi sa ni drug ste /
T04D3897:112b-25: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gnas dang /
T04D3897:112b-26: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas dang /
T04D3897:112b-28: dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas dang /
T04D3897:112b-30: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gzhal yas so //
T04D3897:112b-31: de la rgyal chen bzhi'i gnas ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3897:112b-33: ri rab kyi bang rim bzhi dang /
T04D3897:112b-35: nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i gzhal yas rnams so //
T04D3897:112b-36: de la 'di nas steng du bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu na /
T04D3897:112b-38: ri rab la yongs su bskor te zla ba dang /
T04D3897:112b-39: nyi ma dang skar ma rnams kyi gzhal yas khang rnams rgyu bar byed do //
T04D3897:112b-40: de la zla ba dang nyi ma dag lhun po'i phyed nas te /
T04D3897:112b-41: mu khyud 'dzin gyi ri'i rtse mo dang mnyam par rgyu bar byed do //
T04D3897:112b-42: tshad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dpag tshad lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:112b-43: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig go //
T04D3897:112b-45: lhun po'i phyed na nyi zla ste /
T04D3897:112b-46: dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas //
T04D3897:112b-48: skar ma rnams kyi gzhal yas kyi tshad ni /
T04D3897:112b-49: gang dag chung ba de ni rgyang grags tsam mo //
T04D3897:112b-50: nyi ma'i gzhal yas kyi 'og phyi rol ni me
T04D3897:112b-51: shel gyi rang bzhin zlum po ste 'od zer ni
T04D3897:112b-52: tsha ba dang rab tu gsal bar byed do //
T04D3897:113a-1: yas khang gi 'og kyang chu shel zlum po bsil ba dang gsal bar snang bar byed do //
T04D3897:113a-2: zla ba gcig gis gling bzhir bya ba byed do //
T04D3897:113a-3: nyi ma gcig gis kyang ngo //
T04D3897:113a-5: gang gi tshe byang sgra mi snyan du mtshan byed
T04D3897:113a-6: yin pa de'i tshe shar gyi lus 'phags su nyi
T04D3897:113a-7: ma nub pa'o // 'dzam bu'i gling du nyi ma phyed do //
T04D3897:113a-8: ba glang spyod du shar ba'o //
T04D3897:113a-9: de bzhin du gling gzhan la ci rigs su sbyar ro //
T04D3897:113a-10: 'dir nyi ma'i 'gro ba'i bye brag gis mtshan mo dang nyin mo dag 'phel ba dang 'grib pa'o //
T04D3897:113a-12: bh'a dra ba de'i nag po'i phyogs kyi dgu nas mtshan mo 'phel lo //
T04D3897:113a-13: ph'a la gu na'i nag po'i phyogs kyi dgu nas mtshan mo 'grib bo //
T04D3897:113a-14: gang gi tshe mtshan mo 'phel ba de'i tshe nyin mo 'grib bo //
T04D3897:113a-15: gang gi tshe nyin mo 'grib pa de'i tshe mtshan mo 'phel lo zhes so //
T04D3897:113a-16: dkar po'i phyogs kyi dang por zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyams par mthong ba ci yin zhe na /
T04D3897:113a-17: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T04D3897:113a-18: ngos gzhan la grib ma babs te dkyil 'khor ma
T04D3897:113a-19: rdzogs par mthong ba yin no lo //
T04D3897:113a-20: yang na rgyu ba'i 'tshogs pa gang las de de 'dra ba ste /
T04D3897:113a-21: res 'ga' ni nyams pa dang phyed dang rdzogs par
T04D3897:113a-22: mthong ba yin no zhes sngon gyi slob dpon rnams
T04D3897:113a-23: gsungs so // nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal yas 'di rnams la ni /
T04D3897:113a-24: rgyal chen ris bzhi'i gzhal yas khang na gnas pa'i lha rnams gnas so //
T04D3897:113a-25: bang rim bzhi pa la rgyal po chen po bzhi gnas pa nyid do //
T04D3897:113a-29: nub tu mig mi bzang dang /
T04D3897:113a-32: 'di la bang rim bzhi yod de //
T04D3897:113a-33: bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu //
T04D3897:113a-34: stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang //
T04D3897:113a-35: brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis thad 'phags //
T04D3897:113a-36: de la lag na gzhong thogs dang //
T04D3897:113a-37: phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang //
T04D3897:113a-38: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas //
T04D3897:113a-39: ri bo bdun po rnams la yang //
T04D3897:113a-40: des na de yi lhun po yi //
T04D3897:113a-42: ri rab kyi steng sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas chu dang zheng du stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T04D3897:113a-43: ri mchog gi logs re re la dpag tshad stong
T04D3897:113b-0: phrag nyi shu ste kun du yongs @113b su 'khor
T04D3897:113b-1: bar brgyad cu'o zhes gzhan dag go //
T04D3897:113b-2: de'i dbus na grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya
T04D3897:113b-3: ba brgya byin lha'i dbang po'i rgyal ba'i gnas so
T04D3897:113b-6: grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa /
T04D3897:113b-7: 'og gzhi gser bzhin bkra zhing mnyen //
T04D3897:113b-8: logs la stong phrag phyed dang gsum //
T04D3897:113b-9: 'phang du dpag tshad gcig dang phyed //
T04D3897:113b-11: grong khyer de'i dbus na rnam par rgyal ba zhes
T04D3897:113b-12: bya ba ni khang bzangs rin po che sna bdun
T04D3897:113b-13: gyi rang bzhin can yod do //
T04D3897:113b-15: de na rnam par rgyal byed de //
T04D3897:113b-16: logs la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:113b-18: grong khyer de'i phyogs bzhi ru skyed mos tshal bzhi rnams so //
T04D3897:113b-24: skyed mos tshal bzhi po de rnams kyi bar du
T04D3897:113b-25: ni sa gzhi bzang po dpag tshad nyi shur lha
T04D3897:113b-26: rnams kyi rol mo'i gnas phan tshun 'gran pa ltar
T04D3897:113b-28: grong khyer de'i byang shar gyi mtshams na shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes pa yod do //
T04D3897:113b-29: de yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
T04D3897:113b-30: 'dod pa'i dga' ba rab tu gyur pa'i rten no
T04D3897:113b-31: // de'i rtsa ba sboms su thang kar dpag tshad lnga dang 'phang du dpag tshad gcig go //
T04D3897:113b-32: yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma rgyas par gnas pa la ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:113b-33: de la yang me tog thams cad yongs su rgyas
T04D3897:113b-34: pa na dri ni rdzi phyogs su dpag tshad brgya
T04D3897:113b-36: rdzi phyogs ma yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcu dang ldang ngo //
T04D3897:113b-37: shing 'di dag gi rtsa ba na shin tu ches
T04D3897:113b-38: 'jam pa p'ana ru kam pa la zhes pa'i brgya
T04D3897:113b-39: byin lha'i dbang po bzhugs pa'i phyir mngon par grub
T04D3897:113b-40: pa srid du dpag tshad drug cu'o //
T04D3897:113b-41: zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu'i tshad tsam mo //
T04D3897:113b-42: rngams su tshad ni dpag tshad bco lnga'i //
T04D3897:113b-43: blta na sdug gi lho nub kyi mtshams na chos bzangs lha'i 'dun sa ste /
T04D3897:113b-44: gang du bsdad nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bya ba dang /
T04D3897:113b-45: bya ba ma yin pa bka' bgro bar mdzad pa'o //
T04D3897:113b-46: ri rab kyi steng gru bzhi la cog bzhi ste /
T04D3897:113b-47: 'phang du dpag tshad stong phrag bcu'o //
T04D3897:113b-48: kha cig gru'i cog ni dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad
T04D3897:113b-49: dang ldan pa gdan lha phyag na rdo rje gnas
T04D3897:113b-50: pa gang yin pa'o zhes so //
T04D3897:114a-4: bsam gtan dang po'i sa dang /
T04D3897:114a-5: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa dang /
T04D3897:114a-6: bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa dang /
T04D3897:114a-8: bsam gtan dang po'i kun 'khor dang /

T04D3897:114a-10: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i kun 'khor dang /
T04D3897:114a-11: ming gzhan ni bsam gtan khyad par can no //
T04D3897:114a-12: bsam gtan gsum pa'i kun 'khor dang /

T04D3897:114a-16: tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-17: tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal yas khang ngo //
T04D3897:114a-18: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa la gnas gsum mo //

T04D3897:114a-21: tshad med 'od kyi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-22: 'od gsal gyi gzhal yas khang ngo //
T04D3897:114a-23: bsam gtan gsum pa'i gnas la gsum ste /
T04D3897:114a-25: dge chung gi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-26: tshad med dge'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-27: dge rgyas kyi gzhal yas khang ngo //
T04D3897:114a-28: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa la gnas brgyad de /
T04D3897:114a-30: sprin med kyi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-31: bsod nams 'phel gyi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-32: 'bras bu che ba'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-33: mi che ba'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-34: mi gdung ba'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-35: gya nom snang ba'i gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-36: shin tu mthong gi gzhal yas khang dang /
T04D3897:114a-37: 'og min gyi gzhal yas khang ngo //
T04D3897:114a-38: 'thab bral la sogs pa bzhi rnams kyi gzhal yas
T04D3897:114a-39: khang gi tshad ni lhun po'i steng dang mnyam mo
T04D3897:114a-41: gong ma nyis 'gyur ro zhes gzhan dag go //
T04D3897:114a-42: bsam gtan dang po'i gzhal yas khang ni gling bzhi'i tshad tsam mo //
T04D3897:114a-43: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i gzhal yas khang ni stong chung ngu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad do //
T04D3897:114a-44: bsam gtan gsum pa'i gzhal yas khang ni stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad do //
T04D3897:114a-45: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gzhal yas khang gi tshad ni
T04D3897:114a-46: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3897:114b-1: bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa gzhal yas khang
T04D3897:114b-2: gsum gyi tshad ni stong chung ngu la sogs pa'i
T04D3897:114b-3: tshad do // bsam gtan bzhi pa'i gzhal yas khang ni dpag tu med pa'o zhes kha cig go //
T04D3897:114b-4: de la gnas 'og mar skyes pa'i lha rnams kyis
T04D3897:114b-5: gong ma'i gzhal yas khang mthong ba ni ma yin
T04D3897:114b-6: no // gnas gong mar skyes pa'i lha rnams kyis 'og ma'i gzhal yas khang mthong ba nyid do //
T04D3897:114b-8: rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa la brten nas gong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:114b-9: gong du skyes pa 'ongs nas mthong bar 'gyur zhing /
T04D3897:114b-10: khams gong ma ni ma yin no //
T04D3897:114b-11: sa gong ma pa zhes pa yang mthong ba ma yin no zhes so //
T04D3897:114b-12: gzugs med pa'i khams ni sa gzhi dang /
T04D3897:114b-15: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang /
T04D3897:114b-16: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi sa dang /
T04D3897:114b-17: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi sa dang /
T04D3897:114b-18: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi sa'o //
T04D3897:114b-19: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi kun 'khor dang /
T04D3897:114b-20: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi kun 'khor dang /
T04D3897:114b-21: ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi kun 'khor dang /
T04D3897:114b-22: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi kun 'khor ro //
T04D3897:114b-23: de ltar gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' ni yod pa ma yin te /
T04D3897:114b-24: nam mkha'i khams ci snyed pa de snyed 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3897:114b-25: rnam par gzhag pa 'di rnams ni 'jig rten gyi
T04D3897:114b-26: khams rnams kyi phyogs bcu dang steng dang 'og tu
T04D3897:114b-27: go skabs sam bar chod nas yod pa ma yin
T04D3897:114b-28: te / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ni 'jig bzhin pa dang 'chags bzhin pa yin pa dang /
T04D3897:114b-29: 'og min las steng na yang 'dod pa'i khams /
T04D3897:114b-30: 'dod pa'i khams las 'og tu yang 'og min no zhes so //
T04D3897:114b-31: gang zhig rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i gnas la sogs pa
T04D3897:114b-32: nas 'og min gyi mthar thug pa nyi shu nyer
T04D3897:114b-33: gsum gyi gnas rnams kyi 'og dang steng du tshad
T04D3897:114b-36: bang rim bzhi pa ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rtsa ba'i gnas te /
T04D3897:114b-37: 'di nas dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi bcu'o //
T04D3897:114b-38: de nas 'og gi 'dzam bu'i gling du /
T04D3897:114b-39: ji srid yod pa de srid nas steng sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas so //
T04D3897:115a-1: bu'i gling du ji srid pa de srid steng du 'thab bral gyi gnas so //
T04D3897:115a-2: de las yang 'og 'dzam bu'i gling du ji srid
T04D3897:115a-3: pa de srid du dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas zhes
T04D3897:115a-4: so // de bzhin du rgyas par thams cad la rjes su gzhal lo //
T04D3897:115a-5: shin tu mthong nas 'og tu 'dzam bu'i gling du
T04D3897:115a-6: ji srid pa de srid steng du 'og min gyi
T04D3897:115a-7: gnas so // de skad du yang /
T04D3897:115a-8: 'og tu ji srid gnas las gnas //
T04D3897:115a-9: gong du de srid de las de //
T04D3897:115a-11: de las steng du yang gnas ni yod pa ma yin no //
T04D3897:115a-12: de nas 'di ni thu bor gyur pa nyid pas 'og min zhes brjod do zhes so //
T04D3897:115a-13: pandi ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis
T04D3897:115a-14: bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par
T04D3897:115a-15: nges pa las snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par nges
T04D3897:115a-16: pa zhes bya ba le'u gsum pa'o /
T04D3897:115a-18: // / sems can gyi 'jig rten ni rnam pa gnyis so //
T04D3897:115a-20: so so'i skye bo'i 'jig rten dang /
T04D3897:115a-22: de la dang po ni rnam pa gnyis so //
T04D3897:115a-26: de la ngan 'gro'i skye ba rnam pa gsum mo //
T04D3897:115a-31: bde 'gro'i skye ba la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T04D3897:115a-38: yi dvags kyi 'gro ba pa dang /
T04D3897:115a-41: 'di rnams su lha min gyi 'gro ba pa bcug ste /
T04D3897:115a-43: / de la dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la gsum ste /
T04D3897:115a-44: tsha ba'i dmyal ba brgyad gnas pa dang /
T04D3897:115a-45: grang ba'i dmyal ba brgyad gnas pa dang /
T04D3897:115a-46: nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba gnas pa'o //
T04D3897:115a-47: yi dvags kyi 'gro ba la rnam pa gnyis so //
T04D3897:115a-51: dud 'gro'i 'gro ba la rnam pa gsum mo //
T04D3897:115a-56: mi'i 'gro ba la rnam pa bzhi'o //
T04D3897:115a-58: 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115a-59: ba glang spyod kyi gling du skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115a-60: sgra mi snyan gyi gling du skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115b-0: @115b lus 'phags po'i gling du skyes pa'o //
T04D3897:115b-1: lha'i 'gro ba pa ni rnam pa gsum mo //
T04D3897:115b-5: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o //
T04D3897:115b-6: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa la rnam pa drug ste /
T04D3897:115b-9: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /
T04D3897:115b-12: bltas pas ni 'phrul dga'i lha dang /
T04D3897:115b-14: lha 'di rnams kyi 'khrig pa rnam pa lnga ste /
T04D3897:115b-21: de la gnyis sprod kyi 'khrig pa ni sa la
T04D3897:115b-22: gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po pa dang sum cu
T04D3897:115b-24: dper na mi rnams bzhin no //
T04D3897:115b-25: de rnams ni rlung grol ba las yongs su gdung ba rnam par 'bral ba'o //
T04D3897:115b-26: 'khyud pas 'khrig pa ni 'thab bral rnams 'khyud pa tsam gyis yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba'o //
T04D3897:115b-27: de ltar lag pas bcangs pa ni dga' ldan pa rnams kyi'o //
T04D3897:115b-28: bzhad pas ni dga' ldan gyi lha dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi'o //
T04D3897:115b-29: 'dod pa'i lha drug po 'di rnams ni grags bzhin
T04D3897:115b-30: du lo lnga pa lta bu nas ci srid du
T04D3897:115b-31: lo bcu pa'i byis pa lta bu skye ba'o //
T04D3897:115b-32: de la gzugs na spyod pa rnams ni na bza'
T04D3897:115b-33: dang bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa skye bar 'gyur
T04D3897:115b-34: ro // gzugs na spyod pa rnam bzhi ste /
T04D3897:115b-36: bsam gtan dang po'i gnas su skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115b-37: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa ru skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115b-38: bsam gtan gsum pa'i gnas su skyes pa dang /
T04D3897:115b-39: bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa la skyes pa'o //
T04D3897:115b-40: de la bsam gtan dang po'i gnas su skyes pa la rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3897:115b-43: tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha dang /
T04D3897:115b-45: bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa la skyes pa la rnam pa gsum /

T04D3897:120a-18: po chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig
T04D3897:120a-19: go // des na tshe lo lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:120a-20: mi rnams kyi rtsis kyis lo dgu bcu tham pa'o //
T04D3897:120a-21: mi'i lo brgya la ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go //
T04D3897:120a-22: des na tshe lo stong ngo //
T04D3897:120a-23: mi'i rtsis kyis lo bye ba gsum dang lo 'bum phrag drug cu'o //
T04D3897:120a-24: mi'i lo brgya phrag gnyis la 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:120a-25: des na lo stong phrag gnyis kyi tshe'o //
T04D3897:120a-26: mi rnams kyi grangs rtsis kyis lo bye ba bcu bzhi dang 'bum phrag bzhi bcu'o //
T04D3897:120a-27: mi lo brgya phrag bzhi la dga' ldan pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:120a-28: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag bzhi'o //
T04D3897:120a-29: mi'i grangs rtsis kyis lo bye ba lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang lo 'bum phrag drug cu'o //
T04D3897:120a-30: mi'i lo brgyad brgya la 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin mtshan gcig go //
T04D3897:120a-31: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag brgyad do //
T04D3897:120a-32: mi'i grangs rtsis kyis lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya
T04D3897:120a-33: dang lo bye ba phrag sum cu dang lo 'bum
T04D3897:120a-34: phrag bzhi bcu'o // mi'i lo brgya phrag bcu drug
T04D3897:120a-35: la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin
T04D3897:120a-36: phrag bzhi bcu'o // zhag gcig go // des na tshe lo stong phrag bcu drug go //
T04D3897:120a-37: mi'i grangs rtsis kyis lo bye ba brgya phrag dgu
T04D3897:120a-38: dang lo bye ba phrag nyer gcig dang lo 'bum
T04D3897:120a-39: phrag drug cu'o // lus kyi tshad kyang ni /
T04D3897:120a-40: 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyi ni khru phyed dang bcas pa'i gsum mam /
T04D3897:120b-0: shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyi ni @120b lus kyi tshad ni khru brgyad do //
T04D3897:120b-1: ba lang spyod pa rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni khru bcu drug go //
T04D3897:120b-2: byang sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni khru sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T04D3897:120b-3: rgyal chen pa'i lha rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha'o //
T04D3897:120b-4: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do //
T04D3897:120b-5: 'thab bral ba rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi cha gsum mo //
T04D3897:120b-6: dga' ldan pa'i tshad ni rgyang grags so //
T04D3897:120b-7: 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi tshad ni rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyang grags so //
T04D3897:120b-8: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams kyi phyed dang bcas pa'i rgyang grags ni lus kyi tshad do //
T04D3897:120b-9: nub phyogs pa bye brag tu smra ba na re /
T04D3897:120b-10: rta stong phrag dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang /
T04D3897:120b-11: gdugs kyi tshad ni dpag tshad tsam nyid do //
T04D3897:120b-12: lha rnams dbang po brgya byin gyi //
T04D3897:120b-13: lus kyi tshad ni rgyang grags gsum //
T04D3897:120b-15: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu'o //
T04D3897:120b-16: tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu'o //
T04D3897:120b-17: tshangs pa chen po'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po gcig go //
T04D3897:120b-18: 'od chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po gnyis so //
T04D3897:120b-19: tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po bzhi'o //
T04D3897:120b-20: 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po brgyad do //
T04D3897:120b-21: dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po bcu drug go //
T04D3897:120b-22: tshad med dge'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T04D3897:120b-23: dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T04D3897:120b-24: sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T04D3897:120b-25: bsod nams 'phel gyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po brgya phrag gnyis dang lnga bcu'o //
T04D3897:120b-26: 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po lnga brgya'o //
T04D3897:120b-27: mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po stong ngo //
T04D3897:120b-28: mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag gnyis so //
T04D3897:120b-29: gya nom snang gi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bzhi'o //
T04D3897:120b-30: blta na sdug gi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgyad do //
T04D3897:120b-31: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu drug go //
T04D3897:120b-32: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T04D3897:121a-2: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
T04D3897:121a-3: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched
T04D3897:121a-4: rnams la tshe ni grangs bzhin du bskal pa chen
T04D3897:121a-5: po stong phrag nyi shu dang /
T04D3897:121a-8: stong phrag brgyad cu rnams so //
T04D3897:121a-9: lus kyi tshad ni tshangs ris kyi lha la sogs
T04D3897:121a-10: pa rnams kyi rim pa bzhin du dpag tshad phyed
T04D3897:121a-11: dang / dpag tshad gcig dang phyed dang /
T04D3897:121a-16: dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T04D3897:121a-17: dpag tshad drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T04D3897:121a-18: dpag tshad brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga dang /
T04D3897:121a-19: dpag tshad brgya phrag gnyis dang lnga bcu dang /
T04D3897:121a-20: dpag tshad brgya phrag lnga dang /
T04D3897:121a-22: dpag tshad stong phrag gnyis dang /
T04D3897:121a-23: dpag tshad stong phrag bzhi dang /
T04D3897:121a-24: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad dang /
T04D3897:121a-25: dpag tshad stong phrag bcu drug dang sbyor ro zhes so //
T04D3897:121a-26: ngan 'gro rnams kyi ni rgyal chen pa'i lha rnams
T04D3897:121a-27: kyi tshe'i tshad dag dmyal ba chen po yang sos
T04D3897:121a-29: des na tshe ni lo lnga brgya'o //
T04D3897:121a-30: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni thig nag gi nyin zhag go //
T04D3897:121a-31: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag gcig go //
T04D3897:121a-32: 'thab bral gyi tshe'i tshad ni dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:121a-33: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag gnyis so //
T04D3897:121a-34: dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad ni ngu 'bod dmyal ba chen po'i nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:121a-35: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag bzhi'o //
T04D3897:121a-36: 'phrul dga'i lha'i tshe'i tshad ni dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po'i nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:121a-37: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag brgyad do //
T04D3897:121a-38: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshe'i tshad ni dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin mtshan no //
T04D3897:121a-39: des na tshe ni lo stong phrag bcu drug go //
T04D3897:121a-40: dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa'i phyed do //
T04D3897:121a-41: mnar med pa'i tshe ni bar gyi bskal pa gcig go //
T04D3897:121a-42: dud 'gro rnams ni nges pa med de tshe mchog
T04D3897:121a-43: tu ring ba'i dud 'gro rnams ni bar gyi bskal
T04D3897:121a-44: pa ste / dga' bo dang nye dga' la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T04D3897:121a-45: mi'i zla ba gcig la yi dvags kyi nyin zhag go //
T04D3897:121a-46: des na tshe ni lo la brgya'o //
T04D3897:121a-47: bcom ldan 'das kyis grang ba'i dmyal ba'i tshe tshad gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T04D3897:121a-48: dge slong dag 'dir til kha la nyi shu shong
T04D3897:121b-0: ba'i ma @121b ga dh'a'i bre bo che res kyis
T04D3897:121b-1: rab tu gang bar byas te /
T04D3897:121b-3: de las skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis lo brgyar gyur
T04D3897:121b-4: pa'i tshe til re re phyung bar gyur pa na
T04D3897:121b-5: / dge slong dag til gyi phung po de de
T04D3897:121b-6: srid du rim pa 'dis myur du zad cing mthar
T04D3897:121b-7: thug par 'gro bar gyur pa la /
T04D3897:121b-8: 'dir ngas chu bur can du gyur pa'i sems can
T04D3897:121b-9: rnams kyi tshe'i tshad mthar thug pa ni smra bar
T04D3897:121b-10: bya ba ma yin pa nyid do //
T04D3897:121b-11: ci ltar yang dge slong dag chu bur can gyi
T04D3897:121b-12: nyi shu ni chu bur rdol ba can gyi nyin
T04D3897:121b-13: gcig go // chu bur rdol ba can gyi nyi shu ni aa ta ta'o //
T04D3897:121b-14: aa ta ta'i nyi shu la ha ha'o //
T04D3897:121b-15: ha ha ba nyi shu ni hu hu ba'o //
T04D3897:121b-16: hu hu ba nyi shu ni autpala ltar gas pa'o //
T04D3897:121b-17: de nyi shu la padma ltar gas pa'o //
T04D3897:121b-18: padma nyi shu la padma chen po'o //
T04D3897:121b-19: sgra ngan spangs te bar du 'chi ba ni /
T04D3897:121b-20: thams cad du yod la byang na ni nges pa'i tshe tshad yod do zhes pa'i don to //
T04D3897:121b-21: pandi ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis
T04D3897:121b-22: bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par
T04D3897:121b-23: nges pa las lus dang tshe rnam par nges pa
T04D3897:121b-24: zhes bya ba le'u drug pa'o /
T04D3897:121b-26: // / rnam par mi snang ba'i 'gro ba pa'i sems can ni /
T04D3897:121b-27: chos mngon pa mdzod las ni ma gsungs te /
T04D3897:121b-28: de lta na mdo sde la sogs pa rnams su
T04D3897:121b-29: mang du gsungs pas ni 'dir brjod par bya ste
T04D3897:121b-30: / ci ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'chi 'pho dang
T04D3897:121b-31: skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs bstan pa'i skabs su gsungs
T04D3897:121b-32: / te / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan yin te /
T04D3897:121b-33: spyan gang gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha'/
T04D3897:121b-34: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa tshad med grangs
T04D3897:121b-35: med pa bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i
T04D3897:121b-37: snang ba de dag thams cad la zhing kha cig
T04D3897:121b-38: ni sreg par byed pa dang 'chags bzhin pa dang
T04D3897:121b-39: 'jig bzhin par snang zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:121b-40: gang sems can du snang ba de dag thams cad
T04D3897:121b-41: la kha cig ni ci ltar las kyi nye bar
T04D3897:121b-42: 'gro ba las 'chi 'pho ba byed pa dang /
T04D3897:121b-45: ngan 'gror yang snang zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:121b-46: gang byang chub sems dpar snang ba de dag thams
T04D3897:121b-47: cad la kha cig ni 'pho bar byed pa dang
T04D3897:121b-49: nges par 'byung ba rnams snang zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:122a-0: gang sangs rgyas su snang ba de dag thams cad la kha @122a * //
T04D3897:122a-1: cig ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub bzhin pa dang /
T04D3897:122a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bzhin pa dang /
T04D3897:122a-4: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnams snang zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:122a-5: gang nyan thos su snang ba de dag thams cad la kha cig nges par 'grol bzhin pa dang /
T04D3897:122a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bzhin pa rnams mkhyen zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:122a-7: gang rang sangs rgyas su snang ba de dag thams
T04D3897:122a-8: cad la kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul ston pa dang
T04D3897:122a-9: / yon tan rnam par dag par byed pa rnams mkhyen zhing mthong ngo //
T04D3897:122a-10: gang yang mi snang ba'i 'gro ba pa'i sems can
T04D3897:122a-11: rnams phyi rol pa'i mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa
T04D3897:122a-12: rnams kyi mig gi lam du 'gro ba ma yin
T04D3897:122a-13: no // nyan thos rnams kyi ma yin /
T04D3897:122a-14: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma yin /
T04D3897:122a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ma yin no //
T04D3897:122a-16: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha'i spyan gyis snang bar 'ongs pa yin no //
T04D3897:122a-17: gang dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyogs
T04D3897:122a-18: 'ga' zhig tu shing rta'i 'khor lo'i tshad tsam du
T04D3897:122a-19: / mi snang ba'i 'gro ba pa'i sems can rnams
T04D3897:122a-20: mthong bar yang dag par 'ongs pa de ni shin
T04D3897:122a-22: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T04D3897:122a-23: kyi lha dang mi rnams ni de lta bu ma
T04D3897:122a-24: yin no // de ltar rnam par mi snang ba'i sems can rnams kyi khams ni tshad med pa'o //
T04D3897:122a-25: 'di dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi lha'i
T04D3897:122a-26: spyan gyis sems can sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gdul
T04D3897:122a-27: byar gyur pa gang yin zhes sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T04D3897:122a-28: thams cad du sems can gyi khams la rnam par
T04D3897:122a-30: ci snyed sangs rgyas kyi gdul byar gyur pa'i sems
T04D3897:122a-31: can de snyed pa de dag rnams kyi mdun du
T04D3897:122a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par gnas pa nyid
T04D3897:122a-33: do // sems can de rnams ni 'dul bar byed do //
T04D3897:122a-34: de las gzhan sems can gyis yang dag par shes pa ma yin no //
T04D3897:122a-35: 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa gsum ste /
T04D3897:122a-37: stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
T04D3897:122a-38: stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
T04D3897:122a-39: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3897:122a-40: gling bzhi dang zla ba nyi ma'i ri rab 'dod
T04D3897:122b-0: pa na spyod pa'i lha drug bsam gtan @122b dang
T04D3897:122b-1: po la sogs rnams so sor stong stong tshogs pa
T04D3897:122b-2: rnams la / stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3897:122b-3: stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten de rnams la ni stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3897:122b-4: stong gnyis pa de rnams stong la ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T04D3897:122b-5: rim pa bzhin du stong phrag gcig dang /
T04D3897:122b-7: bye ba brgya'i gling bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams
T04D3897:122b-8: cig char du 'jig pa dang 'chags pa yin no
T04D3897:122b-10: gling bzhi dang ni ri rab dang //
T04D3897:122b-11: nyi zla dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T04D3897:122b-12: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T04D3897:122b-13: stong ni chung ngu dag tu 'dod //
T04D3897:122b-14: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
T04D3897:122b-15: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //
T04D3897:122b-16: de stong la ni stong gsum ste //
T04D3897:122b-17: mnyam du 'jig cing chags pa yin //
T04D3897:122b-19: pandi ta chen po stobs bcu dpal bshes gnyen gyis
T04D3897:122b-20: bsdus pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnam par
T04D3897:122b-21: nges pa las snang ba'i 'gro ba pa'i sems can
T04D3897:122b-22: rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba le'u bdun pa'o
T04D3897:122b-24: / // / bskal pa yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T04D3897:122b-30: de la bar gyi bskal pa'i tshad ni lcags kyi
T04D3897:122b-31: rang bzhin gyi ra ba gru bzhi pa mtho ba
T04D3897:122b-32: dang logs so so la rgyang grags re re yod
T04D3897:122b-33: pa'i nang du til lam nyungs kar gyis bkang ste
T04D3897:122b-34: spyi phung du byas pa'i nang nas lo brgya tshang
T04D3897:122b-35: ba las / re re phyung bar gyur pa na
T04D3897:122b-36: ci srid du thams cad yongs su zad pa'i dus
T04D3897:122b-37: su gyur pa de srid kyi dus la bar gyi
T04D3897:122b-39: bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la ni bskal pa chen po'o //
T04D3897:122b-40: 'jig pa'i bskal pa yang bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gyur pa yin te /
T04D3897:122b-41: de la 'jig pa ni gnyis te /
T04D3897:122b-46: sems can 'jig pa dang snod 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:122b-53: de'i dus de 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin te /
T04D3897:123a-1: 'pho bar 'gyur la skye bar mi 'gyur ba na /
T04D3897:123a-2: 'jig pa'i bskal pa de dbu brtsams pa ste //
T04D3897:123a-3: rim gyis dmyal ba'i sems can gcig kyang lhag ma
T04D3897:123a-4: ma lus par gyur par nges pa na 'jig rten
T04D3897:123a-8: de'i tshe dmyal ba 'di dag nges par myong ba'i
T04D3897:123a-9: las 'dzin pa gang de stong gsum gzhan gyi dmyal
T04D3897:123a-11: de bzhin du dud 'gro'i 'gro ba 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-12: rgya mtsho chen por gtogs pa'i dud 'gro rnams sngon du 'jig par 'gyur ba yin te /
T04D3897:123a-13: mi dang lhan cig spyod cing gnas pa'i dud 'gro
T04D3897:123a-14: ni mi nyid dang lhan cig tu 'jig pa yin
T04D3897:123a-15: no // de bzhin du yi dvags kyi 'gro ba 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-16: dus de 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di yin te /
T04D3897:123a-17: mi 'di rnams su sems can gang yang rung bas
T04D3897:123a-18: rang bzhin gyis slob dpon med par chos nyid kyis
T04D3897:123a-19: thob pa'i bsam gtan dang po yang dag par skye'o
T04D3897:123a-20: // de bsam gtan de las langs nas tshig tu smra bar 'gyur te /
T04D3897:123a-21: kye ma bde ba 'di ni dben pa las skyes pa dga' zhing bde ba'o //
T04D3897:123a-22: kye ma zhi ba 'di ni dben pa las skyes pa dga' zhing bde ba'o zhes so //
T04D3897:123a-23: sgra de thos nas sems can gzhan la yang kun du skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T04D3897:123a-24: dus byas te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123a-25: gang gi tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can gcig
T04D3897:123a-26: kyang lus pa med par gyur pa 'di tsam nyid
T04D3897:123a-29: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-30: de bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-31: de bzhin du ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-32: de bzhin du byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123a-33: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lhar skye bar 'gyur te /
T04D3897:123a-34: de ru skye ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3897:123a-35: nges par 'jig rten 'di 'jig par 'gyur ba yin te /
T04D3897:123a-38: de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams su lha rnams kyi bsam gtan dang po bskyed do /
T04D3897:123a-39: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123a-40: gang gi tshe de ru sems can gcig kyang lhag
T04D3897:123a-41: ma lus pa med par gyur pa 'di tsam ni
T04D3897:123a-42: 'jig rten 'jig par gyur pa yin te /
T04D3897:123b-0: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha'i @123b 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-1: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-2: 'thab bral gyi lha'i 'jig pa ni de bzhin no //
T04D3897:123b-3: de bzhin du dga' ldan lha'i 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-4: de bzhin du 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-5: de bzhin du gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-6: gang tshe 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams gcig
T04D3897:123b-7: kyang lus pa med par gyur pa 'di tsam ni
T04D3897:123b-10: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:123b-11: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du yang sems can gang yang
T04D3897:123b-12: rung bas chos nyid kyis thob pa'i bsam gtan gnyis
T04D3897:123b-14: de nas bsam gtan de las langs te /
T04D3897:123b-16: kye ma bde ba 'di ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa dga' zhing bde ba'o //
T04D3897:123b-17: kye ma zhi ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin las
T04D3897:123b-18: skyes pa dga' zhing bde ba'o zhes pa'i sgra de
T04D3897:123b-19: thos nas sems can gzhan la yang bsam gtan gnyis
T04D3897:123b-20: pa yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-21: dus byas te 'od gsal gyi lha ru skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-22: gang tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du sems can gcig
T04D3897:123b-23: kyang lus pa med par gyur pa 'di tsam nyid
T04D3897:123b-27: de nas snod sems can gyis stong par gyur pas /
T04D3897:123b-28: de'i tshe 'phen byed kyi las yongs su zad pas lhas char mi 'bebs shing /
T04D3897:123b-31: 'bab chu chung ngu rnams skams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-32: de'i rjes su nyi ma gnyis pa rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-33: 'bab chu chen po thams cad skams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-34: de la yang chu bo chen po bdun ni 'di lta ste /
T04D3897:123b-42: de nas nyi ma gsum pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:123b-43: chu bo chen po bzhi dang ma dros pa la
T04D3897:123b-44: sogs pa mtsho chen po rnams skams par 'gyur ro
T04D3897:123b-45: // de la chu bo chen po bzhi ni 'di lta ste /
T04D3897:123b-56: aa na ba t'a ba ta /
T04D3897:123b-58: de'i phyi nas nyi ma bzhi pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-0: de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po yang @124a * //
T04D3897:124a-1: dpag tshad brgya ci srid du chu skams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-2: de ma thag tu nyi ma lnga ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-3: de'i tshe dpag tshad brgya phrag gnyis su chu skams par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-4: de nas nyi ma drug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-5: de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po la chu shin tu
T04D3897:124a-6: nyung ba thigs pa yang lus pa med par 'gyur
T04D3897:124a-7: ro // sa chen po dang ri rab las du ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-8: de'i rjes su nyi ma bdun pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124a-9: de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs te /
T04D3897:124a-10: ci srid du thal ba yang shes par bya ba med do //
T04D3897:124a-11: bsregs pa dang nyi ma rang nyid kyang med par 'gyur te /
T04D3897:124a-12: bud shing ma tshang ba'i me bzhin no //
T04D3897:124a-13: des na nyi ma bdun gyi mes 'jig pa ste /
T04D3897:124a-14: bsam gtan dang po'i bar du sreg par byed do //
T04D3897:124a-15: de bzhin du ba tsha can gyi chu'i char phab
T04D3897:124a-16: nas bsam gtan gnyis pa nyams par byed pa ni
T04D3897:124a-17: chus 'jig pa'o // de'i rjes su rnam par 'khrugs
T04D3897:124a-18: pa'i rlung chen pos bsam gtan gsum pa 'thor bar
T04D3897:124a-19: byed pa ni rlung gis 'jig pa'o //
T04D3897:124a-20: bsam gtan bzhi pa la ni 'jig pa med do //
T04D3897:124a-21: des na 'jig pa ni mdor bsdu na gsum ste /
T04D3897:124a-26: de'i phyir yang bsam gtan dang po na mes 'jig pa kho na srid pa ste /
T04D3897:124a-27: de dag gi dri ma dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3897:124a-28: de yang 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po na rnam
T04D3897:124a-29: par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa'i dri ma
T04D3897:124a-30: yod de / de yang yongs su sreg par byed pa'i phyir na me'i bskal pa'o //
T04D3897:124a-31: bsam gtan gnyis pa ni chu'i 'jig pa kho na ste /
T04D3897:124a-32: de'i dri ma dang chos mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T04D3897:124a-33: de yang 'di ltar bsam gtan gnyis pa na dga' ba'i dri ma yod de /
T04D3897:124a-34: de yang shin tu sbyongs pa'i sbyor bas rten 'jam par byed pa'i phyir na chu'i bskal pa'o //
T04D3897:124a-35: bsam gtan gsum pa na rlung gi 'jig pa kho na'o //
T04D3897:124a-36: de yang 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pa na dbugs 'byung ba dang /
T04D3897:124a-38: de yang rlung nyid kho na'o //
T04D3897:124a-39: des na gang la nang gi bdag nyid kyi bsam
T04D3897:124a-40: gtan snyoms 'jug ci 'dra ba'i dri ma yod pa
T04D3897:124a-41: de la bsam gtan las skyes pa'i phyi rol yang
T04D3897:124a-42: de 'dra ba'o // de nyid kyis na bsam gtan
T04D3897:124b-0: bzhi pa na rnam par rtog pa la sogs @124b
T04D3897:124b-1: pas mi bskyod pas dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir
T04D3897:124b-3: gal te bsam gtan bzhi pa la 'jig pa med na /
T04D3897:124b-4: ci bsam gtan bzhi pa rtag pa yin nam zhe na ma yin te /
T04D3897:124b-5: de ru yang lha'i bu rnams skye bar 'gyur ba
T04D3897:124b-6: na gzhal yas khang dang bcas nas skye bar 'gyur
T04D3897:124b-7: ba dang / 'gag pa na yang gzhal yas khang dang bcas nas 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:124b-8: des na 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni gsum ste /
T04D3897:124b-9: 'di ltar mes 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan gyis pa'o //
T04D3897:124b-10: chus 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan gsum pa'o //
T04D3897:124b-11: rlung gis 'jig pa'i rtse mo ni bsam gtan bzhi pa'o //
T04D3897:124b-12: 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i sde pa'i lung gi tshul
T04D3897:124b-13: las kyang 'jig pa ni drug cu rtsa bzhi ste
T04D3897:124b-14: / de la mes 'jig pa lnga bcu rtsa drug go //
T04D3897:124b-16: rlung gis 'jig pa ni gcig go //
T04D3897:124b-18: bar med par mes 'jig pa bdun no //
T04D3897:124b-33: rlung gis 'jig pa ni gcig go //
T04D3897:124b-34: de ltar bsdus te 'jig pa ni drug cu bzhi'o //
T04D3897:124b-36: me yis lan ni bdun bdun la //
T04D3897:124b-37: brgyad pa brgyad pa chu yis so //
T04D3897:124b-38: gang tshe rlung mchog gcig bgrangs na //
T04D3897:124b-39: drug cu bzhi ni rdzogs par 'gyur //
T04D3897:124b-41: de ltar dmyal ba ru dang po sems can gyi 'pho ba nas bzung ste /
T04D3897:124b-42: ci srid du snod thams cad yang dag par zad
T04D3897:124b-43: par 'gyur ba'i dus 'di ni 'jig pa'i bskal pa
T04D3897:124b-44: ste / bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu'o //
T04D3897:124b-45: de'i rjes su 'jig rten 'di zhig na stong pa
T04D3897:124b-46: nam mkha' tsam nyid du bar gyi bskal pa nyi
T04D3897:124b-48: de'i phyi nas 'chags pa ni gnyis te /
T04D3897:124b-52: de la snod 'chags pa ni sems can rnams kyi
T04D3897:124b-53: lhag pa'i bdag pos nam mkha' la rlung zhan gyis
T04D3897:125a-0: de las ci ltar gsungs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa thams cad skye bar @125a * //
T04D3897:125a-2: 'di tsam ni 'jig rten 'chags par gyur pa yin te /
T04D3897:125a-4: de nas 'od gsal nas sems can gzhan gang rung
T04D3897:125a-5: 'phos nas tshangs pa'i gzhal yas su skye bar 'gyur
T04D3897:125a-6: ro // de ltar de bzhin du de'i 'khor yang ngo //
T04D3897:125a-7: de nyid nas sems can gzhan dag tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don du 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125a-8: de kho na bzhin du tshangs ris dang /
T04D3897:125a-9: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams su rim gyis ci srid du /
T04D3897:125a-16: dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125a-17: sems can 'chags pa'i chos nyid kyis 'di ltar 'byung ba yin te /
T04D3897:125a-18: gang phyis 'jig pa de dag sngon du 'chags pa yin no //
T04D3897:125a-19: gang gi tshe dmyal bar sems can gcig yang byung
T04D3897:125a-20: bar gyur pa de'i tshe 'jig rten 'di chags pa
T04D3897:125a-22: bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgus so //
T04D3897:125a-23: de nas bzung ste bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur chags pa gnas so //
T04D3897:125a-24: 'dir bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams 'od gsal
T04D3897:125a-25: nas 'phos te 'ongs pa ni gzugs na spyod pa
T04D3897:125a-27: yid kyi rang bzhin rang gi 'od dang ldan pa
T04D3897:125a-28: mkha' la kun du 'gro ba dga' ba'i zas can
T04D3897:125a-29: no // des sa'i dri bsnams shing sa'i ro myangs
T04D3897:125a-30: pa dang ldan pa dang zos pa can du 'gyur
T04D3897:125a-31: no // ro // de rnams kyi lus la sra
T04D3897:125a-32: rtsub dang lci bas kun du non cing 'od snang
T04D3897:125a-33: ba yang nub par gyur to //
T04D3897:125a-34: de nas mun pa'i rnam par gyur pa la /
T04D3897:125a-35: nyi ma zla ba dag byung ngo //
T04D3897:125a-36: dang po sa'i bcud zhag gi rnam pa dang /
T04D3897:125a-37: de nas sa zhag khur blta bu dang /
T04D3897:125a-38: de'i rjes su sa zhag gi nags tshal rnams rim gyis byung bar gyur to //
T04D3897:125a-39: shin tu zhen chags pas nub par gyur to //
T04D3897:125a-40: de ma thag tu ma rmos ma btsugs pa'i dri bzang ba myang bde ba'i 'bras skyes so //
T04D3897:125a-41: de la zos bas bshang gci'i lam dang skyes ba
T04D3897:125a-42: dang bud med kyi dbang po dag dang ldan pa
T04D3897:125a-44: skyes pa dang bud med dag gi dbyings tha dad par 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125a-45: de'i rjes su sngon goms pa'i dbang gis tshul bzhin
T04D3897:125a-46: ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'dod pa la
T04D3897:125a-47: chags pa shin tu rgyas par gyur pa las skyes
T04D3897:125a-48: pa dang bud med de dag la phan tshun rjes
T04D3897:125b-0: su chags @125b pas sgrub pa ma yin pa skyes
T04D3897:125b-1: pa nyid do // de'i phyi nas le lo las
T04D3897:125b-2: nye bar sdud par byed pa dang bdag gir byed
T04D3897:125b-3: pa bgyis pas 'bras s'a lu brdas pa ni yang
T04D3897:125b-4: skye ba med par gyur to //
T04D3897:125b-5: de nas zhing rnams rnam par bgos te /
T04D3897:125b-6: bdag gir 'dzin pa byas shing pha rol gir byas so //
T04D3897:125b-7: de nas skyes bu khyad par du gyur pa la
T04D3897:125b-8: bsrung ba'i don du cha drug pa byin par gyur
T04D3897:125b-9: to // de zhing rnams kyi bdag po yin pas
T04D3897:125b-10: rje'u rigs zhes don dang mthun par ming btags so
T04D3897:125b-11: to // // skye bo mang po 'dun pa mthun pas mang pos bkur ba'o //
T04D3897:125b-12: 'bad sa rnams dge bar mdzad pas rgyal po'o //
T04D3897:125b-13: khyim las phyi rol yid la byed pas bram ze'o zhes ming rnams byung ngo //
T04D3897:125b-14: rgyal pos nye bar mnan pa'i rkun po rnams bdag
T04D3897:125b-15: gis de lta bu ma byas so zhes brdzun gyi
T04D3897:125b-17: de ltar 'jig rten chags bzhin pa'i mi rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med par gyur pa las /
T04D3897:125b-18: mi dge ba'i las lam rgyas par gyur nas rim
T04D3897:125b-19: gyis tshe nyams te mthar tshe lo bcu pa rnams
T04D3897:125b-20: chos ma yin pa la chags pa yang ba'i 'dod
T04D3897:125b-21: pas zil gyis non par gyur pa /
T04D3897:125b-22: log pa'i chos la yongs su zhen pa rnams kyi gnod sems kun du 'phel bar gyur pa la /
T04D3897:125b-23: 'jig pa'i bskal pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T04D3897:125b-28: de la lcug ma la sogs pa rnams mtshon char 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125b-29: des sems can phan tshun gsod par byed pa ni mtshon gyis 'jig pa ste /
T04D3897:125b-30: mtshon gyis srog gcod pa ni nyi ma bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125b-31: yang skyon de nyid kyis mi ma yin rnams kyis 'tshe ba gtong bar byed do //
T04D3897:125b-32: gang las sems can rnams nad kyis 'chi bar byed do //
T04D3897:125b-34: zla ba bdun dang zhag bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125b-35: yang skyon de nyid kyis char mi 'bab pas mu ge 'byung ste /
T04D3897:125b-36: de yang mi rnams bkres pa dang skom pa dang nyam chung bas 'tshogs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:125b-37: gzhan dag ni rus pa dkar po bskol nas 'thung bar byed do //
T04D3897:125b-38: gzhan dag ni khyim gyi zang zing rnam par bgos te /
T04D3897:125b-39: thur ma nye bar ston pas de ring ni khyim
T04D3897:125b-40: bdag pho'i bza' ba bya zhing sang ni khyim bdag
T04D3897:125b-41: mo'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-1: so ba'i gnas kyi mtshams bu gnas thur mas so
T04D3897:126a-2: ba'i 'bras bu phyung nas chu mang po bskol ba
T04D3897:126a-3: 'thung bar byed pa ni mu ges 'jig pa ste
T04D3897:126a-4: / lo bdun dang zla ba bdun dang nyi ma bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:126a-5: de ltar bar gyi bskal pa so sor rdzogs pa na 'jig na gsum nyid do //
T04D3897:126a-6: ba lang spyod dang shar gyi lus 'phags po'i gnas su ni /
T04D3897:126a-7: mtshon dang nad dang mu ge rnams gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:126a-8: mtshon ni gnod sems drag po skye ba'o //
T04D3897:126a-9: nad ni mdog ngan pa dang nyam chung ba'o //
T04D3897:126a-10: mu ge ni bkres pa dang skom pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-11: de'i tshe yang kha dog dang stobs chung ba dang
T04D3897:126a-12: bkres pa dang skom pa las gnod sems drag po
T04D3897:126a-14: 'dir chags pa rnams kyis gnas pa nyid ni bar gyi bskal pa dang po'o //
T04D3897:126a-15: de rnams tshe lo bcu pa las yar 'phel du 'gro ste /
T04D3897:126a-16: rim gyis tshe lo stong phrag brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T04D3897:126a-17: 'phags pa gnas brtan pa ni yar 'phel du phyin
T04D3897:126a-18: pa na tshe lo dpag tu med pa yin no
T04D3897:126a-19: zhes zer ro // yang mar 'grib du phyin pa na tshe lo bcu pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-20: 'di ni bar gyi bskal pa gnyis pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-21: de ltar ci srid du yar 'phel dang mar 'grib bco brgyad do //
T04D3897:126a-22: nyi shu pa la ni mar 'grib med de yar 'phel kho na'o //
T04D3897:126a-23: tshe lo bcu pa nas tshe lo stong phrag brgyad cu pa'i bar ro //
T04D3897:126a-24: bar gyi bskal pa 'di rnams kyi yar 'phel dang
T04D3897:126a-25: mar 'grib nyid kyi dus ci srid pa bar gyi
T04D3897:126a-26: bskal pa dang po'i mang 'grib kho na'i dus la'ang
T04D3897:126a-27: de srid do // tha ma'i bar gyi bskal pa yar 'phel ba'i dus la yang ngo //
T04D3897:126a-28: des na bar gyi bskal pa thams cad ni dus mnyam pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-29: de la bar gyi bskal pa gcig gis snod chags pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-30: bar gyi bskal pa bcu dgur ni gnas pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-31: 'jig rten chags nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gnas pa'o //
T04D3897:126a-32: gcig gis snod rnam par nyams par 'gyur te /
T04D3897:126a-34: 'jig rten zhig nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur
T04D3897:126a-35: gnas pa'i bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la bskal
T04D3897:126a-36: pa chen po'o // 'phags pa mang pos bkur ba'i
T04D3897:126a-37: sde pa'i lung las kyang 'di ltar rnam par gzhag
T04D3897:126a-38: pa chen po'o // ste / 'di lta ste /
T04D3897:126a-39: 'jig rten chags bzhin pa na dang po nyid du
T04D3897:126a-40: tshangs pa'i gzhal yas ni 'od gsal nas byung ba'o
T04D3897:126b-0: // de'i rjes su 'od @126b gsal gyi lha'i ris
T04D3897:126b-1: nas lha'i bu gzhan dag 'phos nas rang gi las
T04D3897:126b-2: las skyes pa sku lus dkar ba tshangs pa zhes
T04D3897:126b-3: pa tshangs pa'i gzhal yas de nyid du skyes so
T04D3897:126b-4: // // de'i tshe de bar gyi bskal pa bcur bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to //
T04D3897:126b-5: de nas bskal pa nyi shu'i mtha' ru tshangs pa de gcig bu skye bar gyur pas /
T04D3897:126b-6: kye ma 'di nyid du sems can gzhan dag kyang skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bsams pa dang /
T04D3897:126b-7: des bsams pa nyid kyis de ma thag tu rang
T04D3897:126b-8: rang gi las kyis de dag tu tshangs pa'i 'khor
T04D3897:126b-9: gyi lha rab tu mang ba kun du byung ngo
T04D3897:126b-10: // de yang tshangs pa rang gis bsams ma thag nyid du byung ba de rnams mthong nas /
T04D3897:126b-11: bdag ni 'di rnams kyi skyed byed zhes log pa'i nga rgyal skyes par gyur to //
T04D3897:126b-12: dang por skyes pa rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan
T04D3897:126b-13: pa'i tshangs pa de dag tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams
T04D3897:126b-14: kyis mthong nas kyang 'dis bdag skyed pas bdag gi
T04D3897:126b-15: byed pa po zhes khas blangs so //
T04D3897:126b-16: tshangs 'khor gyi lha de yang bskal pa gcig tu gnas so //
T04D3897:126b-17: de'i 'og tu bskal pa gcig gis tshangs ris kyi lha rnams byung ngo //
T04D3897:126b-18: de nas bskal pa gcig gis tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha'o //
T04D3897:126b-19: de nas bskal pa gcig gis 'dod pa'i gnas sa'i rtse mo gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'o //
T04D3897:126b-20: de nas bskal pa gcig gis 'phrul dga'i lha'o //
T04D3897:126b-21: de nas bskal pa gcig gis dga' ldan gyi lha'o //
T04D3897:126b-22: de nas bskal pa gcig gis 'thab bral gyi lha'o //
T04D3897:126b-23: 'di rnams thams cad ni rang rang gi las kyis gzhal yas khang dang bcas nas grub pa'o //

T04D3897:190b-39: de dag ni phyi nang sreg par byed pa'i don gyis na sdug bsngal lo //
T04D3897:190b-40: sdug bsngal ni lus kyi ste /
T04D3897:190b-41: de ni lus yongs su mnar ba'i don gyis sdug bsngal lo //
T04D3897:191a-1: ba ni sems kyi sdug bsngal te /

T04D3897:191a-3: 'khrug ngal ni sdug bsngal du 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa rgyas pa ste /

T04D3897:191a-5: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa ni mi 'dod pa'i

T04D3897:191a-16: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la sdug bsngal dang mi ldan pa yod pa ma yin te /

T04D3897:226b-13: mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di lta ste /

T04D3897:227a-22: lam ni sgo dang theg pa dang stegs dang sman la sogs par rig par bya'o //
T04D3897:227a-24: sdug bsngal ni mi rtag pa'o //
T04D3897:227a-27: lam ni nges par 'byin par byed pa'o //

T04D3897:227a-38: po 'gog pa zhi bar 'du shes par gyur pa

T04D3897:227b-1: mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pas so //

T04D3897:227b-39: 'byung gnas kyi don gyis na skye mched do /

T04D3897:228b-3: 'jug cing bzod pa gcad pa bsgom pa'o //

T04D3897:275b-9: ston pa dang ldan pa rgyal po lta bu ste
